Banner.Description: For me, software development is never just about tools. It is about understanding why a solution is chosen and how the approach behind it shapes meaningful, reliable software. Passionate about both full-stack development and cloud computing, I find joy in crafting comprehensive solutions that seamlessly integrate frontend and backend technologies while harnessing the power of cloud services.

About.Title: About me
Paragraphs: I'm a Software Engineer with a Master's in Software Engineering from San Jose State University and over 2.5 years of experience building scalable backend systems and cloud infrastructure solutions. My expertise lies in Java Spring Boot, microservices architecture, and cloud-native development.

At Reliance Jio, I architected and maintained scalable backend modules for CloudXp, a Hybrid Cloud Management Platform, including the Cost Management module. I've also designed CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and deployed Dockerized services across AWS, Azure, and on-prem Kubernetes clusters.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):

Jobs.Title: Software Engineer
Description: Built and maintained 4 scalable backend modules for CloudXp, a Hybrid Cloud Management Platform designed to help businesses manage and optimize their cloud infrastructure across various cloud providers, serving users with hybrid cloud analytics and governance services.
Improved API response latency by 85% by profiling Java Spring Boot services and optimizing SQL queries, reducing average latency from 1.3s to 200ms.

Migrated 15+ microservices from Oracle to PostgreSQL, redesigning schemas, implementing multi-threaded/concurrent query processing, and improving query throughput by 40%, enhancing reliability and scalability.
Designed CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps; deployed Dockerized services across AWS, Azure, and on-prem Kubernetes clusters.
Partnered with data teams to integrate Spark batch jobs and stream outputs to real-time dashboards.
Mentored 5 junior engineers in clean code practices, debugging, and on-call rotations; led code reviews to maintain production quality.

Jobs.Title: Software Development Intern
Description: Evaluated and validated Flutter through a successful Proof of Concept (POC) to pave the way for building and deploying cross-platform mobile apps, significantly boosting the team's development velocity.
Engineered responsive web apps using JavaScript, optimizing the user interface for mobile and desktop to increase accessibility and engagement.
Debugged and resolved 20+ issues following Agile practices and used Git for version control, ensuring on-time project delivery.

Projects.Title: GitTranslate
Projects.Description: A tool designed to make coding tools accessible to non-native English speakers by providing AI-powered translation for Git repositories and documentation. Built with Next.js and FastAPI, it helps bridge language barriers in software development and makes programming resources more inclusive for global developers.

Projects.Title: BridgeWorks
Projects.Description: A community-driven platform designed to alleviate homelessness by connecting unhoused and at-risk individuals in San José with short-term gigs and service opportunities. Built with React.js, FastAPI, and MongoDB, it features a reputation scoring system that helps rebuild work experience and foster pathways to employment and housing.

Projects.Title: Local-LLM-Inference-Rayserve
Projects.Description: This project sets up a local inference server using a Hugging Face language model served via vLLM, Ray Serve, and FastAPI. The server runs entirely on CPU or GPU and provides a production-style architecture for local testing and development.

Projects.Title: MedAssist
Projects.Description: Built for AWS MCP Hackathon: Developed an agentic AI-powered medical triage system using React, TypeScript, and FastAPI. Implemented autonomous medical case analysis using Anthropic Claude's agentic capabilities for real-time risk assessment. Created an intelligent document processing pipeline for medical reports with automated emergency notifications via Twilio.

Projects.Title: A Hybrid Classification Method for Heart Disease Detection
Projects.Description: Published in International Journal of Applied Engineering Research (Nov 2021). By combining methods like Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), Transformers, and ensemble learning, these models can pick up both small details and big patterns in patient data. This shows that using different algorithms together can make predictions in healthcare more accurate.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: Feel free to reach out by clicking the button below to send me a message. Whether you have inquiries, job opportunities, or just want to say hello, I'm always eager to hear from you. Let's start a conversation!
